website_summaries.verdict: Choose this one if you split numerous logs on a regular basis and price isn't a factor. However, it's more power and machine than most users need.
pros: This powerful machine is capable of splitting lots of large logs fast with the power of the 208cc gasoline engine
Has a tough build throughout, and can be used vertically or horizontally
cons: It's heavy and challenging to assemble – easier to do with at least 2 people

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand assembly instructions, easy to assemble, easy to use AND it splits stringy wet white fir just on idle. Four cords took less than two gallons. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely! I like the way they included a step ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job nicely! I like the way they included a step by step video of how to assembly the unit made it a lot easier. I had a little problem at the start because one of the parts had a problem, but I called the phone # in the manual and they sent a replacement part right away. Unit has to be warmed up in the cold climates for a while before getting started but so far I'm "Happy" with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Nice splitter
customer_reviews.text: The assembly took a bit longer and the main beam was heavier than expected. We rented an engine hoist to pick it up. The vertical operation of the splitter is smooth and steady.. We have split white and red oak, walnut, cherry, apply and maple with good results.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one heavy duty machine. My son-in-law has a $7,000 splitter with all kinds of bells & whistles. But this one works great. I'm amazed at how big a log it can easily handle. Just make sure you have help putting it together. It is HEAVY!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Brotman

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: a spring came off took a bit to figure out the problem, finally got it going. Scratched up a bit but it is a log splitter.
customer_reviews.author: James E Hall

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: great splitter, the log cradle makes this so easy to use. only negative is that when you start up after the engine is warm it takes a few extra pulls to get it started.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome features, easier than others to work with as you change positions.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Non finer
customer_reviews.text: Split a full cord of 24" oak the first day we got it. Took 3 hours. Set/up for one person was easy. It's well balanced to hook on trailer. Wish. It had a 4 way wedge option. It certainly has the power. Started on first pull every time. Liked the fact there were no fenders to get in my way while working. Suggest you wear orange gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Rancher Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stand boom up, easily hooks to wheel base.
customer_reviews.text: Easily splits 24x26 inch oak. Well built, better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Engine worked fine. Filled with oil and hydraulic oil
customer_reviews.text: Hydraulics did not work. Spent my day putting together. Engine worked fine. Filled with oil and hydraulic oil. Now I have to empty and repack this thing. I'll never purchase equipment like this online ever again. Purchase local and pay more is ok with me. What a hassle!!! I am bummed out. Live and learn!!🐖💨
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: let me tell you it cuts like butter no regrets
customer_reviews.text: got it and i was excited , then i got to use it , let me tell you it cuts like butter no regrets ,split about 1 cord and a 1/2 , 4 hours took my time no help , ( i recommend this product ) .
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks well built. Too cold to try just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Susie H.

customer_reviews.title: but if they are like the ones we have received and used they are ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift, but if they are like the ones we have received and used they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Smith

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Went together fine. Works as it should. My only suggestion would be, have two people available to assemble it. the top table is quite heavy. (which is a good thing.)
customer_reviews.author: Kay Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome. Everything that they said it would do Lots of power splits everything we put in it
customer_reviews.author: dan tye

product_meta.title: Southland Outdoor Power Equipment SLS20825 25 Ton Gas Powered Log Splitter
product_meta.description: The Southland 208cc 25-Ton Gas Log Splitter features a Southland OHV gas engine that produces 8.5 ft. lb. of torque for splitting the most demanding types of wood. Save time and effort with easy to use controls and 25-Ton force to split a 26 in. log every 17 seconds. This versatile log splitter can switch from horizontal to vertical splitting position so you can roll larger logs under the wedge without having to lift them. The 25-Ton log splitter is towable for easy mobility.
feature_bullets: 208cc Southland OHV gas engine delivers maximum performance for the most rugged conditions
Internal oil deliver system provides extra lubrication to internal engine bearings reducing heat build-up and extended engine run life
Effortlessly does big splitting jobs with a 17-second cycle time and automatic returns
Versatile log splitter can switch from horizontal to vertical splitting position so you can roll larger logs under the wedge without having to lift them
A 2 in. hitch and 16 in. x 4.8 in. pneumatic wheels provide maneuverability to split wood near the woodpile

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars20 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
